::Firearm::

Firearm nods, glancing at the scanners. His eyes widen as he sees the 
explosion at the Ark.

"One sec," he says to Battera, walking over to a console. He pushes a button, 
activating the ships communication systems.

"Cybertronian Fire to Ark," he says into the michrophone, "What's goin' on 
over there?"
